text: Ajay Kumar Tripathi (12 November 1957 â€“ 2 May 2020) was an Indian judge. He was a Judicial Member of Lokpal from 23 March 2019 until his death. He was also the Chief Justice of Chhattisgarh High Court from 7 July 2018 to 22 March 2019. Tripathi was born in Bihar. On 5 April 2020, Tripathi was diagnosed with COVID-19. He died in New Delhi on 2 May 2020 from the infection, aged 62.Lokpal member Justice Tripathi dies of COVID-19 ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in New Delhi Category:People from Chhattisgarh Category:Indian judges
title: Ajay Kumar Tripathi
